mapper.insert: INSERT INTO markettype(largecode, largename, mediumcode, mediumname) VALUES(#{largecode}, #{largename}, #{mediumcode}, #{mediumname})
INSERT INTO user(gender, age, point) VALUES(#{gender}, #{age}, #{point})
INSERT INTO preference(uid, mid, isprefer) VALUES(#{uid}, (select id from Markettype where mediumname = #{mname}), #{isprefer})

INSERT INTO advertiser(mtid, marketname, marketbranch, marketaddress, lat, lon) VALUES((select id from Markettype where mediumcode = #{mediumcode}), #{marketname}, #{marketbranch}, #{marketaddress}, #{lat}, #{lon})
insert into paper (p_aid, p_mtid, p_image, p_point, p_coupon, lat, lon, sheets) values (#{p_aid}, #{p_mtid}, #{p_image}, #{p_point}, #{p_coupon}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{sheets});
